query:
UPDATE weeks 
SET weekGroup = CASE 
  WHEN weekNumber BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN 1
  WHEN weekNumber BETWEEN 6 AND 10 THEN 2
  WHEN weekNumber BETWEEN 11 AND 14 THEN 3
  WHEN weekNumber BETWEEN 15 AND 18 THEN 4
  ELSE weekGroup
END
WHERE type != 'live';

  WHEN weekNumber BETWEEN 11 AND 14 THEN 3
